overview_info.Subject:
Das Musicology gehört zum Studienbereiche Musicology, Music Pedagogy der Fächergruppe Art, Music, Design.Weitere Informationen zur Fächergruppe Art, Music, Design.
                                                Musicology

Target group: Students with a first professional qualification from a degree in Musicology, Music Education, Teaching at Grammar Schools with a major in Music, Cultural Studies with a major in Music, Media Studies with a major in Music or after a case-by-case examination or possibly passed entrance examination recognised as equivalent degree program with predicate grade.
Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: The application-oriented degree course is oriented towards professional work in empirical music research, popular music, media, music teaching and key skills.Career-Orientated Practical
